Uses of Interface
co.cask.cdap.api.dataset.Dataset

Packages that use Dataset
co.cask.cdap.api.app An Application is a logical grouping of Streams, Datasets, Flows, Procedures, and other deployable elements. 
co.cask.cdap.api.dataset Defines APIs for accessing and managing data within CDAP. 
co.cask.cdap.api.dataset.lib Collection of Dataset implementations available out-of-the-box in CDAP. 
co.cask.cdap.api.dataset.table Provides access to the system-level table Datasets available within CDAP. 
 

Uses of Dataset in co.cask.cdap.api.app
 

Method parameters in co.cask.cdap.api.app with type arguments of type Dataset
 void ApplicationConfigurer.addDatasetType(Class<? extends Dataset> datasetClass)
          Adds a DatasetModule to be deployed automatically (if absent in the CDAP instance) during application deployment, using Dataset as a base for the DatasetModule.
protected  void AbstractApplication.addDatasetType(Class<? extends Dataset> datasetClass)
           
protected  void AbstractApplication.createDataset(String datasetName, Class<? extends Dataset> datasetClass)
          Calls ApplicationConfigurer.createDataset(String, Class, DatasetProperties), passing empty properties.
 void ApplicationConfigurer.createDataset(String datasetName, Class<? extends Dataset> datasetClass, DatasetProperties props)
          Adds a Dataset instance, created automatically (if absent in the CDAP instance), deploying a Dataset type using the datasetClass parameter as the dataset class and the given properties.
protected  void AbstractApplication.createDataset(String datasetName, Class<? extends Dataset> datasetClass, DatasetProperties properties)
          Calls ApplicationConfigurer.createDataset(String, String, DatasetProperties), passing the dataset class and properties.

 interface DatasetDefinition<D extends Dataset,A extends DatasetAdmin>
          Defines named dataset type implementation.
 

Uses of Dataset in co.cask.cdap.api.dataset.lib
 

Classes in co.cask.cdap.api.dataset.lib with type parameters of type Dataset
 class AbstractDatasetDefinition<D extends Dataset,A extends DatasetAdmin>
          Basic abstract implementation of DatasetDefinition.
 class CompositeDatasetDefinition<D extends Dataset>
          Handy implementation of DatasetDefinition that implements basic methods by delegating logic execution to underlying dataset definitions.
 

Subinterfaces of Dataset in co.cask.cdap.api.dataset.lib
 interface ACLTable
          A dataset that stores ACLs.
 interface ObjectStore<T>
          A dataset that stores objects of a particular class into a table.
 

Classes in co.cask.cdap.api.dataset.lib that implement Dataset
 class AbstractDataset
          Handy abstract implementation of Dataset that acts on a list of underlying datasets and implements TransactionAware and MeteredDataset interfaces by propagating corresponded logic to each dataset in a list when possible.
 class CounterTimeseriesTable
          A Dataset for incrementing counts over time periods.
 class IndexedObjectStore<T>
          An ObjectStore Dataset extension that supports access to objects via indices; lookups by the index will return all the objects stored in the object store that have the index value.
 class IndexedTable
          Implements a table that creates and maintains indexes on values stored within a configured set of column names.
 class KeyValueTable
          A key/value map implementation on top of Table supporting read, write and delete operations.
 class TimeseriesTable
          Defines a Dataset implementation for managing time series data.
